TopicTitle: A mod to turn off parts glowing green when you mouse over them (for cinematic purposes)

Articles.Content: The title says it all. I'd love to be able to film shots without dodging my craft when Kerbcam activates. It's fun, but annoying. I had a mod a while ago, but it's outdated.

Oh! I actually asked for just this thing before 1.0 dropped and Claw wrote a quick mod for this. I tested it and it still works in 1.0.4. Just make sure not to hover over your craft on launch pad as it starts calculating physics or the part will stay highlighted.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/116075-Shader-glow-remover-Toggle-the-hover-over-green-glow-while-in-EVA-flight-mode
